section.title: Overview
section.para: This is a module which provides a UNIX/UDP SOCKET transport layer implementation for the Event Interface.

section.title: DATAGRAM events syntax
section.para: The event payload is formated as a JSON-RPC notification, with the event name as the method field and the event parameters as the params field.

section.title: DATAGRAM socket syntax
section.para:
There are two types of sockets used by this module, based on the sockets type. An UNIX socket should follow this syntax:
['unix:'] unix_socket_path

An UDP socket should follow this syntax:
'udp:' address ':' port
